name: Edit Widget
author: Jaytesh Barange

sections.description: This Plugin gives Link in Front-end for Administrator to go to Edit (edit widget link) options of widget in Back-end when Admin is logged in. This will redirect Administrator to Edit Widget Settings. Good for Admin usage and Developers.
sections.installation:
1. Upload edit_widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. No Settings needed to use this plugin.

short_description: This Plugin gives Link in Front-end for Administrator to go to Edit (edit widget link) options of widget in Back-end when Admin is logged in
